text: @Alyssa_Milano Its not all trumps fault, mainly his fault but not entirely. People made that choice to ingest it and not consult a doctor first. People need to stop LISTENING to him and start doing whats right. Thats why USA is #1 for having highest number of death and cases for the COVID19
